articles.author: Chris Wesseling
articles.title: Eagles WR Alshon Jeffery could start season on PUP list
articles.description: The Philadelphia Eagles risk beginning their championship defense without top receiver Alshon Jeffery, who could start the season on the physically unable to perform list.

articles.title: Ivana Bacik says #MeToo helped women like her speak out
articles.description: Labour senator tells Parnell Summer School of being harassed as a waiter in London

articles.author: Bloomberg News
articles.title: Not even Trump’s trade threats can slow this booming port in a tiny Canadian town
articles.description: Prince Rupert is often the quickest, most reliable, and cheapest route to get everything from Nike sneakers to John Deere tractor parts from Asia into the U.S. heartland

articles.author: CBC News
articles.title: Maxime Bernier criticizes Liberals for 'extreme multiculturalism' | CBC News
articles.description: The man who nearly bested Andrew Scheer in the last Conservative leadership race is condemning the Liberal approach to multiculturalism, warning "ever more" diversity is leading to the ghettoization of minorities and fostering a culture of dependence.

articles.title: Turkey's president accuses the U.S. of betrayal, as tensions rise over the detainment of an American pastor
articles.description: "You seek to stab your strategic partner in the back," President Recep Tayyip Erdogan said on Monday.

articles.author: Charlie Hall
articles.title: No Man’s Sky player is sharing 3.8 billion credits worth of gear with random strangers
articles.description: One Redditor is spreading the wealth, 18 million credits at a time. The full load of Stasis Devices is worth more than 3.8 billion in-game.

articles.author: Christine Manby
articles.title: You can't ask me that: How well do you sleep?
articles.description: There’s no easy answer to this one because most people don't want to know how you slept. But with data indicating that we’re more tired than ever, Christine Manby asks experts if we really need eight hours of sleep?

articles.title: Rally by White Nationalists Was Over Almost Before It Began
articles.description: Angry counterprotesters far outnumbered the small band of far-right demonstrators who turned out in Washington, and then quickly dispersed, on the anniversary of the violent Charlottesville rally.

articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Twitter Lite expands to 21 more countries, adds push notifications
articles.description: Twitter announced today its Twitter Lite app is expanding to 21 more countries, which makes the data-saving app available to now over 45 countries in total. The app was first introduced last year with the goal of bringing in more users from emerging markets t…

articles.title: Two more arrested in Frost burglary case
articles.description: Two more suspects, ages 16 and 20, have been arrested in the burglary of memorabilia from the home of Nebraska football coach Scott Frost.

articles.title: Bitcoin Rises by 2% But Rest of the Crypto Market is Still Struggling
articles.description: Bitcoin price has risen by around 2%, increasing from $6,250 to $6,400. But, the rest of the crypto market is still struggling to gain momentum.
